content: 1 sl into the next chain 7 cut yarn and weave in the end 8 trim the yarn at the end of the tail leaving 1/4 finishing completed crocheting the number of bookworm bookmarks you plan to make then add the eyes if you glue standard googly eyes let them dry overnight please let the recipients know they re not intended for small children who may pull off the eyes and attempt to eat them - consult the minimum age on the eye package copyright barbara svachak version 1 0 page 2 of 2
